title: Does Having ADHD Help or Hurt Entrepreneurs?
sub_head: Research shows that the condition can bring an abundance of energy and intense focus on things you’re passionate about. But there’s also a downside.
body:
A few years into his first full-time job after college, David Mammano realized something felt off.
“I just couldn’t stand it,” says Mr. Mammano, now 52. “I felt really boxed in and imprisoned almost, even though it was a good company and the people were nice.”
